translation.en: ♪ Hey ♪
translation.ja: あなたが知らないだけ

translation.en: -♪ This place is hot… ♪ -[man 1] That's not good.
[woman on comms] What are you doing, Captain?
translation.ja: 大尉 一体 何を？

translation.en: I think it's pretty obvious. I'm stealing this jet.
translation.ja: ジェット機を盗んでるんだ

translation.en: [woman] I think it's pretty obvious you're trying to.
translation.ja: 時間移動は こちらで追跡可能よ

translation.en: -You know I can track your jump. -Yeah, but you know that I know that.
translation.ja: 時間移動は こちらで追跡可能よ そちらの知らないこともある

translation.en: So one of us doesn't know something else, right?
translation.ja: そちらの知らないこともある

translation.en: [man 2] Ma'am, he's initiated wormhole sequencing.
translation.ja: 〝パルス砲〞 ワームホールを作っています ワームホールを作っています

translation.en: [woman] Adam, I want you to listen very carefully.
translation.ja: アダム よく聞いて

translation.en: If you don't abort right now, I will shoot you out of the--
translation.ja: 停止しないと撃ち落とし…

translation.en: I'm sorry to interrupt what I'm sure is gonna be a scary threat,
translation.ja: 脅迫を遮って悪いけど

translation.en: but if I'm right, your tracking system is about to…
translation.ja: 追跡システムは たぶん…

translation.en: -…crash. -♪ We made it, baby ♪
-♪ Gimme some lovin' ♪ -♪ Gimme some lovin' ♪
-Okay, let's not die! -[alarm beeping]
[boy] Adam!
I'm gonna kill you! Reed!
translation.ja: 殺すぞ　アダム･リード

translation.en: Oh no. I'm so sorry. That's my bad. Hi.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい これも何かの縁…

translation.en: -No. -Okay. Bye!
[boy] Reed! Get your ass back here.
translation.ja: リード 戻ってこいよ

translation.en: -Got anything else you wanna say? -Actually, I--
-[groans] -Huh? No more jokes?
translation.ja: ジョークは終わりか？ 楽しんでやる

translation.en: -Oh, I'm gonna enjoy this. -[Adam] Who talks like that?
translation.ja: ジョークは終わりか？ 楽しんでやる いじめ入門書で 話し方を学んだの？

translation.en: Did you order, like, a "Bully Starter Kit" on Amazon or somethin'?
translation.ja: いじめ入門書で 話し方を学んだの？

translation.en: I mean, do you even hear yourself? Chuck, we talked about this.
translation.ja: チャックもバカにしてたぞ

translation.en: -I didn't say anything. -Shut up, Chuck.
translation.ja: 知らない 裏切るな

translation.en: [man on PA] There will be an assembly in the gymnasium now. Please proceed to the gymnasium.
Not a word.
[Mrs. Reed] See his face? And, what, you're gonna suspend Adam? Because what?
translation.ja: 顔を殴られた息子を 停学にするの？

translation.en: You think he started a fight with that thug Ray? Was it Ray Dollarhyde again?
translation.ja: またレイ･ダラハイドの 仕業でしょ

translation.en: It's barely been a year since we lost his father. You could show some compassion.
translation.ja: アダムは父を 亡くしたばかりなのよ

translation.en: [Adam] It wasn't my fault.
I know you, Adam. I know that mouth of yours. I know exactly what got you punched.
translation.ja: また憎まれ口を たたいたんでしょ

translation.en: He was giving me crap in front of the whole class.
translation.ja: みんなの前で バカにされたから

translation.en: -I couldn't just take it. -He's twice your size.
translation.ja: みんなの前で バカにされたから 体格を考えて

translation.en: Everyone is twice my size. I've seen babies bigger than me.
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんすら 僕より大きいんだよ

translation.en: -I don't understand you. -Dad would.
translation.ja: 手に負えない パパなら…

translation.en: What's going on, honey? Can you just tell me?
translation.ja: 何を考えてるか話してよ

translation.en: If I keep having to leave work in the middle of the day,
translation.ja: ケンカで停学は３度目よ

translation.en: I'm gonna lose my job. It's the third time you've been suspended for fighting.
translation.ja: 仕事を抜け続けたら ママはクビになる

translation.en: You'd think I'd be better at it by now.
This goes on your permanent record. Get that? Care about your future?
translation.ja: 記録に残るのよ 将来を考えて

translation.en: Do you? Son, you'd better start caring, because the future is coming, sooner than you think.
translation.ja: 将来なんて あっという間に来るんだから

translation.en: [Mrs. Reed] Hey, Adam.
Adam, I'm headed out. Come and have your dinner.
translation.ja: ママは出かけるわ 夕飯を食べて

translation.en: Where you goin'?
Oh, just out to dinner with a friend.
Which friend?
-His name's Derek. We work together. -You're goin' on a date.
translation.ja: 同僚のデレクと デートか

translation.en: -Not a date. I don't think it's a date. -Your dress thinks it is.
translation.ja: デートじゃない オシャレしてる

translation.en: Oh, it is a date. I am going on a date. Why am I going on a date?
translation.ja: ええ デートね なぜ私はデートへ？

translation.en: Can we please stop saying "date" now? Thanks.
translation.ja: 何度 “デート”って言う気？

translation.en: Adam, I'm sorry. We… we should have spoken about this. I don't know how to handle it. Let's talk about it now.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい きちんと話し合いましょう

translation.en: -Dear God, no. -No! You can have any kind of feeling.
translation.ja: やだよ どう思ってもいいの ただ家族として…

translation.en: -It's normal. As long as we're a team-- -[phone alert]
translation.ja: どう思ってもいいの ただ家族として…

translation.en: Oh! Time to go.
[Mrs. Reed] He texted me?
Well, look at that. It's a whole new world.
translation.ja: 慣れない状況だけど 今夜 話し合いましょう

translation.en: -But we will talk about it tonight, honey. -Mom, wait.
translation.ja: 慣れない状況だけど 今夜 話し合いましょう 待って

translation.en: -What? -Turn around.
-Make good choices, okay? -Said the boy who got suspended.
translation.ja: 慎重にね 停学中のくせに

translation.en: [chuckles] I love you, honey.
I love you too, Mom. More than I know.
translation.ja: 僕も心の底では愛してる

translation.en: [Mrs. Reed] Listen, while I'm out, lock up the back.
translation.ja: 裏口の戸締まりをしてね

translation.en: No ovens, no answering the door, no video games.
translation.ja: オーブンもゲームも禁止よ

translation.en: Hawking?
What is it? You see something?
-[whining] -Hawking, stop! Hawking!
[echoing] Hawking!
-[Hawking whimpers] -Oh my God. You scared the crap out of me.
-[rustling] -Who's there?
I don't think we should be out here.
We're okay.
-[barking] -Hawking!
Take it easy.
-Or, you know, fall down and scream. -[clattering]
translation.ja: 転んで叫ぶのもいいが

translation.en: -Jeez. Who the hell are you? -Put the bat down.
Put the bat down. I'm not gonna hurt you, I promise.
translation.ja: バットを置け　何もしない

translation.en: -What are you doing in here? -Mostly bleeding.
translation.ja: 何してる？ 血を流してる

translation.en: [sighs] Wait, how old are you?
-What? -How old are you?
Twelve.
[whispers] Twelve…
Shit!
-How did you get in my dad's garage? -I… It was open.
translation.ja: パパの車庫だぞ 開いてたんだ

translation.en: No, it wasn't. And that is a flight suit. Are you a pilot?
translation.ja: ウソだね 服装からして操縦士？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, listen to me. Uh--
Don't-- Hey, don't call anyone. Put the phone down. I won't hurt you.
translation.ja: 電話するな　何もしないから

translation.en: You said that already.
-Well, it bears-- God damn it! -[squelching]
Uh, it bears repeating.
-[sighs] -That's a lot of blood.
Well… well, I have so much more in my body. Where's your mother?
translation.ja: まだまだ流せるぞ ママはどこ？

translation.en: On a date.
With who?
-What? -With who? What's his name?
-I don't know. Derek? -Derek?
Derek. Derek, Derek, Derek. That's, yes, the guy with the, um… with the mouth mullet.
translation.ja: デレクか ちょろりヒゲの男だな

translation.en: -The goatee? -Yeah.
So say goatee.
-Yeah, he doesn't matter. -None of them matter.
translation.ja: どうでもいい 他の男もね

translation.en: Nice dog.
I'm gonna go inside the house. I'm gonna get some stuff.
translation.ja: 家で物資を補給してくる

translation.en: Hey, careful with that.
-Stay here. -[clattering]
[groans] Come on.
[grunts] Told you to stay in the garage.
And let some creepy dude just wander around my house alone?
translation.ja: 不審者を 家に侵入させたまま？

translation.en: -Yeah… -I don't think so.
Yeah, believe me. I don't wanna be here any more than you want me here.
translation.ja: 俺だって ここにいたくない

translation.en: I just gotta stop bleeding long enough.
Gotta dress the wound, prevent a nasty infection, and I will be on my merry way.
translation.ja: 布を当てて感染を防いだら 喜んで出てくよ

translation.en: Don't touch that.
-I was just looking. -Don't touch my stuff.
translation.ja: 見てるだけ やめろ

translation.en: -Is this a lightsaber? -No, it's not.
translation.ja: ライトセーバー？ 違う

translation.en: -Okay. -No. Enough with the bat!
translation.ja: そう バットは やめろ 危害を加える気はない

translation.en: -[clattering] -If I wanted to hurt you, I would have.
translation.ja: バットは やめろ 危害を加える気はない

translation.en: If I'm being honest with myself, you have a very punchable face.
translation.ja: 殴りたくなる顔を してるけどな

translation.en: -Oh my-- -God! That--
Gah! That bullet went straight through. Good.
-Cool. -Wait, wait, wait. Bullet? You were shot?
translation.ja: 待って 撃たれたの？

translation.en: Yeah-- No, actually, no.
translation.ja: 銃弾で刺されたとでも 思うか？

translation.en: No, I was stabbed with a bullet. What do you think, you moron?
translation.ja: 銃弾で刺されたとでも 思うか？ マヌケめ

translation.en: -I'm a moron? You're the one who was shot. -All right, okay, that's it. [coughs]
translation.ja: 撃たれるのもマヌケ もう黙ってろ

translation.en: -[farting sound] -That… Wow… That, uh…
That's weird. It farts when I cough. -[coughs] -[farting sound]
translation.ja: 咳(せき)すると傷から屁(へ)が出る

translation.en: -Gross. -Super gross.
I'm gonna go upstairs, grab some stuff. Stay cool. You can trust me.
translation.ja: 上で物を取ってくる 心配するな

translation.en: Easy for you to say. I'm the one who ends up in a therapist's office, telling them about where the bad man touched me.
translation.ja: 大人の男にイタズラされる 恐れがあるのに？

translation.en: Oh God! That's where you go? Immediately? You are dark, man.
translation.ja: そんな心配してるのか 陰気な奴(やつ)だな

translation.en: -[young Adam] Who even are you? -That is classified.
translation.ja: 一体 何者？ それは機密事項だ

translation.en: Why are you here?
-Also classi… classified. -Are you in the air force?
translation.ja: それも機密事項 空軍の人？

translation.en: When I say "classified," what does your brain hear? Chocolate?
translation.ja: “機密”の意味を 知らないのか？

translation.en: -What's with the lightsaber? -It's not a lightsaber.
translation.ja: ライトセーバーは？ 違うと言ってるだろ 落ち着け アダム

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Adam. -I need you to play it cool. -Wait.
translation.ja: 違うと言ってるだろ 落ち着け アダム

translation.en: -I know playing it cool isn't your thing. -Wait.
translation.ja: 冷静な対応は苦手だろうが…

translation.en: -It never has been-- -Wait, wait! How do you know my name?
translation.ja: 冷静な対応は苦手だろうが… なぜ僕の名前を？

translation.en: You're Adam Reed. Born February 10th, 2010.
translation.ja: アダム･リード 2010年２月10日生まれ

translation.en: Your parents are Ellie and Louis Reed. Louis would've died about a year ago.
translation.ja: エリーとルイスの子 ルイスはおととし 死んだ

translation.en: You don't play any sports because of acute asthma. -Plus you're freakishly small for 12. -[frantic barking]
translation.ja: ぜんそくと体格のせいで スポーツはしない

translation.en: You go to Franklin Middle School, where you've been suspended two, three times for fighting,
translation.ja: ケンカで３回ほど 学校を停学になってる

translation.en: which is ironic because you can't fight to save your life.
translation.ja: ケンカなんてできないのにな

translation.en: [in unison] Hawking! Zip it!
translation.ja: ホーキング 静かに

translation.en: How do you know my dog's name?
Because I named him.
-Where are you goin'? -[gasps]
-[wheezing] -Oh God.
[shakes inhaler] All right.
Here, ready? Deep breath.
translation.ja: いいか？ そのまま吸え

translation.en: Hold it.
Three, two, one.
Everybody gets a trophy.
When I was seven,
I ran into a table on the patio.
I got 12 stitches.
[in unison] Right here.
You knew how to get into my dad's garage. You knew how to close the fridge.
translation.ja: パパの車庫に入れて 冷蔵庫の閉め方も知ってた

translation.en: You knew how to time my breathing. We have the same scar.
translation.ja: 呼吸の数え方を知ってて 同じ傷がある

translation.en: And you're wearing my dad's watch.
translation.ja: パパの腕時計を着けてる

translation.en: This watch.
This watch.
You're me.
Holy shi--
That's classified. But yes…
I once was.
I can't believe you're future me.
Okay, you came to terms with that pretty quickly. It's a little disturbing, actually.
translation.ja: 飲み込みが早すぎて 気味悪いな

translation.en: -So why are you here? -Rescue mission.
translation.ja: なぜ現代に？ 救出だ

translation.en: I wasn't supposed to land here. I was aiming for 2018.
-I need to get there as soon as possible. -Who were you trying to save in 2018?
translation.ja: 早く向かわないと 誰を助けるの？

translation.en: Really?
Fine. Can you at least tell me how you got here?
I'll show ya.
What was that?
-Crap. -What?
Uh, we're gonna switch to plan A, which is where you come in.
translation.ja: プランＡに移行する お前の出番だ

translation.en: You see, time jets, like all tech in the future, is coded to its user's DNA.
translation.ja: あのタイムジェットは 搭乗者のＤＮＡを認識する

translation.en: Because I'm injured… aah, the jet won't even clear me to fly, which means I can't get in there to fix her.
translation.ja: 負傷中は搭乗拒否されるから 中の修理もできない

translation.en: But guess who can?
There she is.
[Adam] Away we go.
Okay. Sit down.
-Oh my God. -Yeah, yeah, yeah. Sit down.
Let's see what we're dealing with here. All right, some minor shield damage.
translation.ja: 状態を確認する 装甲の破損と冷却液の漏出か

translation.en: -Coolant leaks. -[beeping]
translation.ja: 装甲の破損と冷却液の漏出か

translation.en: I don't know what that is, but when is a flashing red light ever good?
translation.ja: よく知らないが 赤い点滅はヤバそう

translation.en: I know you wanna touch all the pretty buttons
with your sticky little child fingers, but the reactor has a quantum signature.
translation.ja: リアクターは 量子の痕跡を残す

translation.en: You fire it up, they can find us. If they're here.
translation.ja: 作動させれば敵に見つかる

translation.en: Who are "they"?
I'm glad that you didn't ask me that because "they" are classified.
translation.ja: 機密事項じゃないと思うか？

translation.en: -I already know you're from the future. -Believe me, I regret that.
translation.ja: 未来人だろ？ 言っとくが過去の自分なんて 見たくもなかった

translation.en: I had no intention of coming back to revisit… this.
translation.ja: 言っとくが過去の自分なんて 見たくもなかった

translation.en: Jesus. Okay.
Okay, I've isolated the damaged relays,
so the ship should be able to start repairing itself.
translation.ja: 自動修復が始まるはずだ

translation.en: How long will that take?
Ah, it's at 50% capacity, so hopefully less time than it takes me to heal.
translation.ja: 50％の修復力だから 俺の傷より早いだろう

translation.en: [young Adam] Wait.
-Do you remember this? -Remember what?
This. Right here, right now. You being here in 2022?
translation.ja: 2022年に来て 過ごした時間だよ

translation.en: -Know where you're going with this. -If this is happening to me--
translation.ja: その話か 僕が体験し…

translation.en: -You're wasting your time. -That means it already happened to you.
translation.ja: 時間の無駄だ マルチバースじゃないなら あんたも体験したはず

translation.en: Unless it works like a multiverse, where each ripple creates an alternate timeline--
translation.ja: マルチバースじゃないなら あんたも体験したはず

translation.en: It's not a multiverse! My God, we watched too many movies.
translation.ja: 全然 違う 俺たち 映画の見すぎだ

translation.en: I just wanna know.
Okay.
Okay, the prevailing wisdom is that when I go back to my fixed time,
translation.ja: フィックス･タイムに 戻った時

translation.en: my memory… our memories, they reform, they reconcile.
translation.ja: 俺たちの記憶は修正される

translation.en: -But not while I'm here. -Fixed time? What's that?
translation.ja: 後からな フィックス？

translation.en: There's only one place in time where you belong on a quantum level,
translation.ja: 本来 人間が 属する時間軸は１つだ

translation.en: where you're not screwing around with the cosmos like I am.
translation.ja: 他に行けば秩序をかき乱す

translation.en: That is your fixed time. Where you actually belong.
translation.ja: 本来 属する時間軸が フィックス･タイムだ

translation.en: So by being here and telling me this, you may have just changed my whole future?
translation.ja: あんたが現代に来たから 僕の未来はメチャクチャに？

translation.en: Honestly? Your future is pretty tragic either way.
translation.ja: お前の未来は元から悲惨だ

translation.en: [laughs] I'm kidding! I'm kidding.
I'm not kidding.
I'm kidding. Let's go. Come on. Here we go.
translation.ja: 冗談だって　行くぞ

translation.en: [young Adam] So what happens now?
Nothin'. I'm just gonna lay down. Let this bullet wound heal.
translation.ja: 何もしない　休んで傷を治す

translation.en: Think about some key investment opportunities for your future.
translation.ja: お前の未来を よくする方法を考えよう

translation.en: -Wait, like Biff from Back to the-- -Are you out of your tiny mind?
translation.ja: ビフみたいな… 冗談に決まってるだろ

translation.en: Get back in the house before our mother gets home, and don't make it weird.
translation.ja: 早く家に戻れ ママに怪しまれるな

translation.en: -[sniffles] -Hey.
[frustratedly] Yes?
-This is amazing. -Isn't it, though?
translation.ja: すごいね そうだな

translation.en: Mind hitting the light on your way out?
Oh, hey. I'm surprised you're still up.
translation.ja: アダム まだ起きてたの？

translation.en: Well, this night's been full of surprises, mother.
translation.ja: すごい夜だったからね

translation.en: That's chilling. What happened?
How was your not-a-date? Will you be seeing him again?
translation.ja: それよりデートは？ また会うの？

translation.en: -No. I don't know. I don't think so. -[knocking at door]
translation.ja: さあね 会わないかも

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
-Me again. -Yes, it is.
You left your scarf in my car.
-I did. Gosh, thanks. -[Derek] Oh, hey there, kiddo.
translation.ja: ありがとう やあ 坊や

translation.en: Oh. This is my son, Adam. Adam, this is Derek.
translation.ja: アダム こちらはデレクよ

translation.en: Oh, hey, Adam.
Hello. You have a wonderful mouth mullet. You must be very proud.
translation.ja: 立派なちょろりヒゲだね

translation.en: Oh my gosh, Adam. [laughs]
-Never heard it called that before. -Well, thanks again.
translation.ja: そう呼ぶのか？ ありがとう

translation.en: Sure. See you soon.
Unlikely, but I'll put in a good word for you.
Okay. Okay. I'll see you at work.
translation.ja: やめて また職場で

translation.en: He seems nice.
What?
You can be a real jerk sometimes.
You know that? [sighs]
Hey there. Good morning.
Shouldn't you be at work?
Yeah, I need to pay the insurance on the house today.
translation.ja: 住宅保険料を払わないと

translation.en: Had it in the calendar, but I can't find the statement.
translation.ja: 請求書が見当たらないの

translation.en: [Adam] With that filing system? Shocking. It should all be online.
translation.ja: 完璧な分類方法なのにね 電子化したら？

translation.en: The minute I find myself with a few extra hours, I will set up those accounts.
translation.ja: 時間があれば そうするわ

translation.en: Until then, this is how your dad did it.
Hey, grab a pile.
Sorry. I gotta get to my room to think about what I've done.
translation.ja: 部屋で反省するのに忙しい

translation.en: Okay. I gotta go.
Call me if you need me.
[Adam] I won't.
Mom's gone to work.
-Dad's favorite song. -♪ There's only one thing ♪
-♪ Gonna set you free… ♪ -Yeah, me too.
-♪ That's my love… ♪ -See, we agreed on something. -Maybe the only thing. -♪ That's my love… ♪
translation.ja: 趣味が合ったのは これだけだな

translation.en: -♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ -What?
-I just… You're… kinda ripped. -♪ Let my love open the door ♪
translation.ja: 立派な筋肉だと思って

translation.en: -♪ When everything feels… ♪ -Okay.
Do you work out?
-My genetics don't… -Ever have a thought and not let it out? Could be fun to just keep it in.
translation.ja: 口に出さずに 考えるのも楽しいぞ

translation.en: Maybe in the future, there's, like… like, gene therapy or nanotechnology for--
translation.ja: 未来では遺伝子治療や ナノテクノロジーが…

translation.en: -Don't do it. Don't… don't do it. -♪ Let my love open the door ♪
-♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ -So when does… all this happen. Does everyone skip leg day in the future?
translation.ja: いつ筋トレしなくても ムキムキになれるの？

translation.en: -♪ To your heart… ♪ -Does it happen in college?
Oh, wait. Do we get a lot of girls in college?
-I-- -Adam, time travel exists.
translation.ja: お前は時間旅行を目撃した

translation.en: [laughs] It exists. Isn't that crazy?
Every conceptual idea you have about the universe
translation.ja: 常識をブチ壊す経験なのに―

translation.en: has just been thrown out the window. Yet your big question is, "Do I get laid?"
translation.ja: 童貞を卒業できたかが 知りたいのか？

translation.en: -Do I? -[Adam] Jesus Christ.
-I was just wondering. -[Adam] Wonder in silence.
translation.ja: 気になる 黙って気にしろ

translation.en: -♪ Let my love open the door ♪ -Oh my God! It's gonna happen!
-Where you goin'? -Drugstore.
translation.ja: どこへ？ 薬局だ　傷の手当てをする

translation.en: I need to get this wound closed up.
translation.ja: 薬局だ　傷の手当てをする

translation.en: You're gonna go dressed like that?
Why don't you wear some of Dad's clothes?
How long ago was Dad's accident?
translation.ja: 死んだのは いつだ？

translation.en: About a year and a half ago.
She still hasn't cleaned out his closet.
translation.ja: まだ片づけられないか

translation.en: She's not much of a housekeeper.
Hey. You have her to take care of you. She has no one. You understand?
translation.ja: お前にはママがいるが ママは誰にも頼れない

translation.en: Do you understand? She wakes up every morning with a broken heart and a closet full of his clothes
translation.ja: 夫の服を捨てられないほど 傷ついてる

translation.en: and gets nothing from you but a fistful of crap, and not even, like, ten seconds of genuine empathy.
translation.ja: なのに息子は反抗的で 寄り添ってくれない

translation.en: I'm you, you know.
Tell me about it. You know, 30 years, you still get sick to your stomach every time you remember how you treated her now.
translation.ja: 30年間もママへの態度を 後悔することになるぞ

translation.en: I used to love this jacket.
Dad did too.
I keep waiting to wake up and miss him less, but that hasn't happened yet.
translation.ja: いつかパパが 恋しくなくなるのかな

translation.en: Do you still miss him?
Missed him while he was here.
-It's not gonna fit you. -Sure it will.
translation.ja: 合わないよ いや 着こなすね

translation.en: -[bleeping] -[young Adam] How's the jet?
It's gettin' there.
So the person you came to save is in 2018.
And somehow, you ended up in 2022. How does that work? You just missed?
translation.ja: なぜ2022年に来ちゃったの？

translation.en: Well, I got shot when I was stealing the plane.
translation.ja: 機体を盗む時に撃たれた

translation.en: So, uh… I was losin' blood. Ship was comin' apart.
translation.ja: 出血したし機体も壊れた

translation.en: I jammed the coordinates. I didn't have time to double-check 'em.
translation.ja: それで座標を間違えた

translation.en: -Wait, you stole the jet? -It's encoded to me.
translation.ja: 盗んだ？ 俺にひも付けられている 強引に借りただけだ

translation.en: So I didn't exactly steal it. I borrowed the shit out of it.
translation.ja: 俺にひも付けられている 強引に借りただけだ

translation.en: -There's a difference. Give me some cash. -You don't have money?
translation.ja: 俺にひも付けられている 強引に借りただけだ 現金をくれ ないの？

translation.en: -We don't use money in the future. -Really?
translation.ja: 未来では不要だ 本当？

translation.en: Of course we use money in the future. Stay here.
translation.ja: 信じるなよ　ここにいろ

translation.en: [Chuck laughs] What's up, Reed?
Crap.
Well, look who we have here.
translation.ja: こんな所で会えるとは

translation.en: Ray, can we just take a break from the ass kicking today?
translation.ja: 今日は いじめを お休みしない？

translation.en: I have a lot going on.
Hey, guys. Enjoying our suspension?
I am now.
[young Adam groans] That's my spleen.
I remember these little turd-burpers.
-Hey, man, we're, uh… just playin' around. -Quiet, Ray. This isn't about you.
translation.ja: 遊んでるだけ レイ お前は関係ない

translation.en: Chuck.
Hey, what's goin' on? Huh?
Get it together. Ray's ready. You're embarrassing yourself.
translation.ja: 相手はやる気だ　戦えよ

translation.en: So you're not gonna break this up?
God, no. That'd be irresponsible of me.
You'll just figure out some other way to pound the crap out of him. You always do.
translation.ja: どうせ別の機会に いじめられるし

translation.en: He's got a big mouth. I get it.
Point is, this fight needs to happen right now. So just give us a second, okay, Ray?
translation.ja: ケンカする必要はある でも少し待って

translation.en: Stretch out. You don't wanna pull a hammy.
What are you doing?
Hey, Ray Dollarhyde has been bullying you for years
translation.ja: お前が小さくて生意気だから レイはいじめる

translation.en: because you're small, and fragile, and you have a big mouth.
translation.ja: お前が小さくて生意気だから レイはいじめる でもレイは争いたくない

translation.en: But here's the thing. He doesn't wanna fight.
translation.ja: でもレイは争いたくない

translation.en: -I don't wanna fight either. -He doesn't know that, does he?
translation.ja: 僕だって レイに伝わってないんだ

translation.en: So you're gonna walk over there, and you're gonna raise your hands,
translation.ja: レイに伝わってないんだ だから手を上げて近寄り レイの目をよく見ろ

translation.en: and then you're gonna look Ray right in the eye.
translation.ja: だから手を上げて近寄り レイの目をよく見ろ

translation.en: You're gonna smile in a way that says, "I've waited my entire life for this moment."
translation.ja: “この時を待ってた”という 笑顔を浮かべろ

translation.en: Like you can't wait to watch his soul exit his body.
translation.ja: “どうしても今 伝えたい”ってな

translation.en: Then you're gonna drop to your knees and punch him hard in the private bathing suit parts.
translation.ja: そしたら膝を突き モッコリした部分を打て

translation.en: -I'm sorry, the what now? -Ah! Are we gonna smoke this banana?
translation.ja: そんなバカな “そんなバナナ”じゃない やれ！

translation.en: Or are we gonna talk about it all day? Let's go, go, go, go, go.
translation.ja: “そんなバナナ”じゃない やれ！

translation.en: I'm gonna smoke your banana, motherf--
translation.ja: そんなバナナ このクソども…

translation.en: No, no, no, no! No. That… that's not what we talked about.
translation.ja: 打ち合わせと違うだろ

translation.en: -[groans] -[Ray] Boom! [laughing] Oh yeah!
-[Chuck] Nice, man. -[Ray] You crying, Reed?
Oh no, Chuck. Look, we made him cry.
[Chuck] It's like he was trying to lose.
Run away, Reed!
-What the hell? -I'm not supposed to do this.
translation.ja: 何？ いじめっ子にも いじめっ子がいる

translation.en: Ever hear the expression, "Every bully has a bully"?
translation.ja: いじめっ子にも いじめっ子がいる

translation.en: Yours isn't holding up his end of the bargain, so I'm gonna take over.
translation.ja: 本来 俺が やるべきじゃないが

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -[shushes]
You're a good fighter. You like to kick ass. You're a big kid.
translation.ja: お前は強くて大きいが

translation.en: But if you go near Adam again, I'll know, and I will find you, Ray.
translation.ja: 次にアダムに近づけば 俺が会いに行く

translation.en: And it won't be like a couple of kids in a playground scrap.
translation.ja: 遊び場のケンカじゃないぞ

translation.en: I will pull bones out of your body. I will sharpen them.
translation.ja: お前の骨を抜いて それでチャックを刺してやる

translation.en: -I will use them to stab little Chuckie. -What did I do?
translation.ja: お前の骨を抜いて それでチャックを刺してやる 僕を？

translation.en: Shut your mouth, or I'll fill it with Ray's feet.
translation.ja: レイの足で口を塞ぐぞ

translation.en: You understand what I'm saying? Got all of it? The bones? -Yeah. -Your feet in Chuckie's mouth?
translation.ja: 意味が分かるか？ 骨も足も食わせる

translation.en: -[liquid running] -Good. Are you peeing right now? -Yeah. -You're a real streamer.
translation.ja: 漏らしてんのか？ 大した量だ

translation.en: Get yourself home and clean yourself up.
Be the change you wanna see, okay?
God, I hated those assholes.
Oh, come on.
Hey, Adam.
Get out of my stuff and open the door. Put the drone down. It will kill us both.
translation.ja: ドアを開けろ 変な物に触るとお互い死ぬぞ

translation.en: Hey, look, you lost one fight. I figured you'd be used to that by now.
translation.ja: ケンカに負けるのは 慣れてるだろ

translation.en: You coulda helped. You just stood there.
Christ. You're so sensitive.
Hey, you had to lose that fight.
You had to. Trust me.
You don't go from bein' you to bein' me without gettin' your ass kicked, a lot, all the time.
translation.ja: 耐え抜かないと 俺には なれないんだよ

translation.en: I'm sorry if I went too far today.
Shouldn't have done that.
-[young Adam] Who's this? -Who's who?
Put that back.
You put that back.
As soon as you tell me who she is.
That's my wife, Laura.
We have a wife?
No, we do not have a wife anymore.
-[man] Aah. Hi, there. How are you? -Hey, Paul.
[Paul] Been a while.
[Ellie] Yep, how you doin'? That baby sleeping yet?
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんは よく寝てる？

translation.en: Uh, not really. No.
[chuckles] No. Well, you'll miss those days when they're gone.
translation.ja: いつか夜泣きが恋しくなる

translation.en: Ah, I find that hard to believe.
[Ellie] Believe it. Babies are pure love.
translation.ja: 赤ちゃんは純粋な天使よ

translation.en: They grow into teenagers, who grow into be assassins of happiness.
translation.ja: 10代になると 幸せの破壊者になる

translation.en: Thank you, thank you.
Mm, well, somethin' to look forward to. [chuckles]
Sorry. It's been a rough day.
Year. Couple of years.
Hmm. Your boy still havin' a hard time?
He hates me.
It's not his fault. He's… he's just dealing.
translation.ja: アダムは悪くない 苦しんでるのよ

translation.en: It's fine. We'll be fine. It's good. Good, good, good.
I wish I knew what I was doin' wrong.
You're not doin' anything wrong.
Sorry. [laughs]
-I'm sorry. -[laughing] Sorry, you scared me.
-I was eavesdropping. I'm sorry. -Yeah.
[chuckles] You're right, though. Teenage boys are horrible.
It's like living with a urinal cake that yells at you.
translation.ja: 文句ばかり言う小便器だ

translation.en: Mothers are usually the ones who take the hit.
Yeah.
-But I'll tell you somethin'. -Mmm?
Boys always come back for their mamas.
That's nice.
It sounds like you're speaking from experience.
I am.
You have a good mom?
-[Adam] I do. -Oh.
[whispers] I have the best mom.
Good.
I hope you're right.
I'm still researching boarding schools in Fallujah, so…
translation.ja: ファルージャの 寄宿学校に送る

translation.en: -Good. -[both laugh]
No, I don't mean that. He's such a sweet kid. I'm crazy about him.
translation.ja: 冗談よ　息子を愛してるもの

translation.en: We lost his dad in a car accident year before last.
translation.ja: おととし 夫を事故で亡くしたの

translation.en: Yeah. That's tough.
Yeah. You have no idea.
Well, I have some idea.
-Oh, sorry. -Sorry.
translation.ja: お気の毒に お気の毒に

translation.en: Jinx.
-Thank you. -[Adam] Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう こちらこそ

translation.en: Aren't you grieving too?
I am. Of course I am.
So tell him. You should tell him.
translation.ja: 息子さんに そう伝えて

translation.en: I don't think he needs it.
You think you're being strong for him,
and the problem with acting like you have it all together is… he believes it.
translation.ja: そのまま受け取って 平気なんだと思ってる

translation.en: Maybe he needs to know that you don't.
It's okay if you don't.
My husband had a jacket just like that.
Oh, this is a classic.
Yeah.
It was really nice chatting with you. I'll see you later.
translation.ja: 話せてよかった　また会おう

translation.en: Oh, hey, um…
he doesn't hate you.
He loves you.
More than he knows.
Hey! Hey!
Locked and docked.
Start the area scans for his jet. Let's find him and get the hell outta here.
translation.ja: 彼の機体を見つけて 帰りましょう

translation.en: Find him.
-So you came back for your wife, Laura? -We're not getting into that.
translation.ja: 妻を救いに？ その話はしない

translation.en: Hey, she's my wife too.
-You know what? We should get into that. -Thank you.
translation.ja: 話してやる どうも

translation.en: Met in the academy. She was 20 minutes late to the wrong classroom
translation.ja: ローラは違う教室に 遅刻して入ってきた

translation.en: in the wrong building.
I offered to walk her to the right one, and…
translation.ja: 正しい教室へ案内した

translation.en: man, I was all in before we even made it outside.
translation.ja: 棟を出る前には惚(ほ)れてたよ

translation.en: A couple of years ago, she didn't come back from a jump.
translation.ja: 数年前 彼女はワープから 戻らなかった

translation.en: They told me her jet broke up on reentry, but she was the best pilot in the program.
translation.ja: だが彼女は一流の操縦士だ

translation.en: She wrote the book on reentry. Didn't make sense.
translation.ja: 帰還方法について 本まで書いた

translation.en: And you were trying to get to 2018 'cause that's where she went before?
translation.ja: ローラは2018年に向かった？

translation.en: Yeah.
-What was she doing there? -I don't know.
translation.ja: 目的は？ ログが改ざんされて不明だ 何かが隠されてる

translation.en: They changed the jump logs. Somebody was hidin' somethin'.
translation.ja: ログが改ざんされて不明だ 何かが隠されてる

translation.en: Maybe she saw something Sorian didn't want her to see.
translation.ja: ソリアンの秘密を見たのかも

translation.en: Wait, "Sorian"? Maya Sorian, Dad's partner? -She was always so nice to me. -Hmm.
translation.ja: まさかパパの協力者の マヤ･ソリアン？

translation.en: Yeah, trust me. She's no friend.
Nope.
After Dad died, she got rich off of his tech. Bought all the right people.
translation.ja: パパの技術でカネを稼ぎ 人を買収した

translation.en: Next thing you know, she has exclusive control over the most valuable resource on Earth,
translation.ja: 気付いた時には 彼女は独占支配していた

translation.en: time.
Wait a minute. You're saying Dad invented time travel?
translation.ja: パパが時間旅行を 発明したってこと？

translation.en: Yeah. Not on purpose.
The magnetic particle accelerator. Remember that?
He called it The Adam Project.
translation.ja: アダム･プロジェクトか

translation.en: [Adam] Yeah, or as I like to call it, his favorite child.
translation.ja: 出来がいいほうのアダムだ

translation.en: So what happened to Laura?
Mmm. Well, I think your nice friend Maya had her killed.
-What? -Yeah.
That's why I gotta get back to 2018 as soon as possible.
The jet's almost ready. I'll lay low in the shed.
translation.ja: 搭乗拒否されないくらい 傷が治ったら―

translation.en: I'll heal for a few more days until I can get a clean read
translation.ja: 搭乗拒否されないくらい 傷が治ったら― お前の元から消えてやる

translation.en: and then fly out of your life.
translation.ja: お前の元から消えてやる

translation.en: But going back to save her. -Talking to me. -[whines]
translation.ja: ローラを救うのも 僕に話すのも

translation.en: Everything you're doing right now just to rescue one person.
translation.ja: １人のために 未来を変えることになる

translation.en: You're changing the future. That's gotta be against the rules.
translation.ja: １人のために 未来を変えることになる 倫理に反してるよ

translation.en: You'll feel differently when you meet her.
-And when you lose her. -What?
[shushes] Grab that bag. Get ready to run.
translation.ja: 何？ カバンを持って逃げる準備を

translation.en: Why? What's happening?
We're going that way. Be ready.
-Move! -[whooshing]
Stay behind me. [exhales]
Don't you do it! Don't you do it, Reed!
translation.ja: やめておけ リード

translation.en: Wanna see something cool?
-That's a lightsaber, dude. -Quiet now.
translation.ja: ライトセーバーじゃん 黙れ

translation.en: Time to go. Let's go.
[Sorian] Hello, Adam.
[man] Reed, don't move!
[Adam] Christos. They'll let anyone into this time stream.
translation.ja: お前まで この時間の流れへ？

translation.en: Who's that?
That's Christos. We were in the academy together.
translation.ja: 元同級生のクリストスだ

translation.en: He's a decent pilot but a terrible person. He runs security for Sorian.
translation.ja: 腕はいいが人格は最悪 ソリアンの護衛だ

translation.en: Ouchie, with the face. Did I do that?
translation.ja: ひどい顔だ　俺のせい？

translation.en: God, I hope the boss lets me kill you.
[chuckles] In fairness, though, you did shoot me first. On the bright side, your… your face now matches your soul.
translation.ja: 先に撃ったのは そっちだし 性格に合った顔になったぞ

translation.en: -Anyone say you talk too much? -All the time.
translation.ja: 黙れないのか？ 無理

translation.en: -It's come up. -[Sorian] That's enough.
translation.ja: 努力中 話は終わり

translation.en: Adam, before this goes any further, let's just go home, please.
translation.ja: アダム 無駄な争いはやめて 帰りましょう

translation.en: Uh, no! Just… just no.
So you're risking your own young life
translation.ja: 私がローラを殺したって―

translation.en: over some paranoid delusion that I somehow killed Laura.
translation.ja: 思い込みのために 昔の自分を危険にさらすの？

translation.en: I loved Laura. You were both like family to me.
translation.ja: ローラもあなたも私の仲間よ 殺すわけがない

translation.en: I would never have hurt her. I hate that it's come to this.
translation.ja: ローラもあなたも私の仲間よ 殺すわけがない 残念だけど 実力行使しかないわね

translation.en: Guns.
translation.ja: 残念だけど 実力行使しかないわね

translation.en: Christos, please escort Adam back to 2050.
translation.ja: クリストス アダムを連れ帰って

translation.en: -You're up. -Yeah. All right, drop the Mag-Cyl.
translation.ja: だってさ マグシルを捨てろ

translation.en: -This? -Yeah.
-Yeah. Okay. -All right.
Wanna start low or go high?
-[young Adam] Stop! Get off him! -[Adam groans]
-[guns power up] -[Christos] Come here!
-Move! -♪ I was told what it means ♪
-What is happening? -Dying outside your fixed time is messy.
translation.ja: 今のは？ 違う時間軸で死んだからだ

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -Saving your ass, honey. Behind you!
translation.ja: なぜ ここに？ 助けに来た　後ろ！

translation.en: I can't believe…
-I can't believe you're here. -♪ Good times, bad times ♪
-Hey. -Hi.
That was awesome.
-We should go. -Yep. Let's go.
translation.ja: 急いで ああ 行くぞ！

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on!
Go. Go!
I knew you'd come someday. I just didn't know when.
translation.ja: 来てくれると信じてた

translation.en: [Adam] Of course I came.
[young Adam] Eyes on the road, please.
[Adam] They said you lit up on reentry.
That's crap. I have the top reentry stats in the program.
translation.ja: ありえない 私の技術は一流よ

translation.en: -Oh yeah. -[young Adam coughing]
Laura, this is… me.
-Hi. -Parallel contact, babe?
translation.ja: どうも パラレル･コンタクト？

translation.en: Well, you've always said that you wished you'd met me earlier.
translation.ja: 本来より早く 君に巡り会えたね

translation.en: -Here I am. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 本来より早く 君に巡り会えたね そうね

translation.en: All right, can we maybe slow down a bit now? There's no one even following us.
translation.ja: 誰も追ってきてない スピードを下げてよ

translation.en: Don't look back. Look up.
[Adam] Gotta get off this road. We're too exposed.
translation.ja: この道じゃ撃ち放題だ

translation.en: Okay, baby, it's about to get busier.
Go, go, go, go, go, go, go!
Stop the car.
-What? -What?
-Stop! -[Laura yells]
Okay, back, back. Go, go, go! Reverse!
Back! Back!
Go, go, go, go!
They're leaving.
They're not leaving. They're regrouping.
translation.ja: 隊を立て直してるだけよ

translation.en: -We have to get off this road fast. -[young Adam] What road?
translation.ja: 道を外れないと これが道？

translation.en: [Adam] I… I don't understand. How did you find us?
translation.ja: なぜ ここだと分かった？

translation.en: [Laura] You don't think I'd be watching your back, even in the past?
translation.ja: いつでもあなたを見守ってる

translation.en: [Adam] Why did you make the jump back in the first place?
I was analyzing data when I found something strange in the jump logs. A time jet returning from 2018.
translation.ja: 2018年から戻る機体の ログを見つけたから

translation.en: How's that strange?
Because no one ever flew to 2018.
[Adam] I don't get it. How did it come back if it never left?
Unless someone went back and altered the time stream,
translation.ja: 2018年に行った人が 時間の流れを変え

translation.en: so the future the jet had left from had already been changed.
translation.ja: 2018年に行くという 未来が消えた

translation.en: God, it's like I traded my brains for those muscles.
translation.ja: 筋肉を得て脳を失った？

translation.en: It's a shit deal.
-Cute kid. -Precious, isn't he?
translation.ja: いい子ね 泡が出なくなるまで 水に沈めたいほど可愛い

translation.en: Don't you just wanna hold him underwater till the bubbles stop?
translation.ja: 泡が出なくなるまで 水に沈めたいほど可愛い

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Oh, I freakin' hate myself.
How did this happen?
[Laura] That jet that went back? It was Sorian's. She went back to November 2018 for a reason.
translation.ja: 2018年11月に行ったのは マヤ･ソリアンよ

translation.en: What happened in November 2018?
I'll tell ya. [sighs]
This happened. Your father's magnetic particle accelerator, The Adam Project, had just gone online.
translation.ja: 磁性粒子加速器が ネットで公開されたの

translation.en: That was the first step toward practical time travel.
translation.ja: これが時間旅行への第一歩よ

translation.en: Sorian must've come back to 2018 and given her younger self some kind of future intel.
translation.ja: ソリアンは昔の自分に 未来を教えに行った

translation.en: What for?
My guess is enough future stock tips to amass her fortune
translation.ja: 株の情報でも伝えて カネを稼ぎ―

translation.en: and get rid of whatever political obstacles were keeping her from gaining control of the time program.
translation.ja: 時間の支配に邪魔な敵を 排除するためかも

translation.en: She already had that.
But did she?
No.
No, she didn't.
So this world, our world, everything has already been changed by Sorian.
translation.ja: この世界は既に 彼女に改変されている

translation.en: And your fixed time, 2050, is it bad there?
-We've seen Terminator, right? -Obviously.
translation.ja: 「ターミネーター」を？ 当然

translation.en: That's 2050 on a good day.
Sorian must've spotted me and planted an altitude bomb on my jet.
translation.ja: 彼女は私を発見し 爆弾を仕掛けた

translation.en: Here, eat something.
-I managed to eject, but it didn't matter. -[mouths] Without my jet, I was a permanent castaway.
translation.ja: 脱出できたけど 機体なしじゃ戻れない

Not anymore.
-[sighs] -[Adam] Hey.
I found you.
-[Laura chuckles] -I found you.
You found me.

[young Adam] You kids have fun.
-[sighs] Hey. -Hi.

I know.

Your jet is meshed for your DNA. It won't fly with anyone else.

We meet in the program. We meet there. Do you understand that? We can't…

We never happen.
We never happen, Laura.
We did happen.
Every moment we ever had will always have happened.

What if we don't? What if… what if you're wrong? And you're probably wrong.

-Hey, hey. -[sobs] I can't do this again, okay?

[gasping] Damn it!

Adam! Stop it! Please. [sobs] I know you came for me.

Hey, I love you.
That's why I know you're gonna find me again.

Go!
God damn it!
Come on.
Come on.
Boom.

Till you lose…
She… she just gets taken away.

translation.en: Dad.
Dad.
You're gonna find Dad.
[Adam] Nope.
We're gonna find Dad.
So are you in or are you--

Hello, Laura. You should have stayed dead the first time.

[Adam panting] Okay.
Here we go. All right, give me your hand.
-[whirring] -Like that, yep.
Nice, healthy DNA right there.
Okay, we'll park it down there, grab on to that railing,

[young Adam yelps] What are you doing?
Gotcha!
Hang on.

Don't give me that stink eye.
Where you going?
Shit!

[young Adam] Oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God,

What do you say, kid? Your call.

Gotcha.

-♪ Crazy people knockin'… ♪ -Adam!
I got this.
Come on, Reed. Come on.

Come on!
-Let's not… -[alarm bleeping]
Die!
[man] It's not meant to be easy.

All right, the, uh, reading's on my website, and I'll see you Tuesday.

Dad.
Dad.

What was that?
-That's what you get. -God!
How did you turn out to be an asshole? I thought you loved me.

translation.en: None of it matters anymore.
Wait. It already happened? Somebody already altered time?

translation.en: -Who? -Sorian.
-Maya? -Maya.
She'd never do that. She knows the consequences.

translation.en: Yes, I theorized that with a powerful enough pulse, we could generate utilitarian wormholes in space.

translation.en: that you can use wormholes for time travel. That part's theoretical.
translation.ja: でも時間旅行は まだ仮説に過ぎない

translation.en: -Right. -Still theoretical.
This theory needs to take a leak. So let's go.
Holy shit! I'm the godfather of time travel?
translation.ja: 私が時間旅行の発明者か？

translation.en: Nice hit, Dad.
[whispers] I think I broke my hand.
[Louis] I'm… I'm sorry. This is my fault. My… my ego. My hubris.

translation.en: My need to be best, to be first, to be the smartest guy in the room. And here we are.

translation.en: -A disgusting character flaw. -He didn't know.
-[Louis] But I should have. -Yeah.
Mankind has no business tampering with the mechanics of the universe.

translation.en: There are forces greater than science.

And you? What do you need?
I need to go for a walk.
I can't be here, Adam. I… I have to go.

-Please. -This is… this is bigger than any of us. It's too dangerous what he's asking me to do. I can't.

translation.en: All right. We'll see each other again.

translation.en: Wait.
-I need to tell you something. -No, you can't say anything else to me.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I have to go home. Your mom and you are waiting.

translation.en: [woman] Yes, Senator. Except the stability of these wormholes is no longer a hypothetical,

translation.en: and the work we are doing here is simply ahead of the current statutes.

translation.en: So you can either support my program and be a part of the future,

translation.en: or you can get left behind in the past.
translation.ja: 過去の人になるか選べる

translation.en: [Sorian] Hang up the phone.
What are you doing here? You said I wouldn't be seeing you again.
translation.ja: 何の用？ もう会わない約束でしょ

translation.en: Did I? Hmm.
When was that? Remind me.
[Maya] The last time you just showed up, two months ago.
translation.ja: ２カ月前に最後に現れた時よ

translation.en: Oh, well, for me, it was 32 years ago.
So sorry if I'm a little fuzzy on the details.
translation.ja: だから よく覚えてない

translation.en: Anyway, times have changed.
translation.ja: とにかく 時代は変わったの

translation.en: You can't be here. You know the potential for catastrophic changes to the time stream.
translation.ja: あなたがここにいれば 時間の流れに影響が出る

translation.en: -It's incalculable. -God, I was such a nerd. Will you please just stop talking?
translation.ja: オタクっぽい話はやめて

translation.en: Everything you asked me to do. The stock buys, the offshore accounts, all of it. It's unethical.
translation.ja: あなたに指示された取引は 全部 倫理に反する

translation.en: -And illegal. -This isn't a joke. It's dangerous.
translation.ja: 違法だしね 笑い事じゃない　危険よ

translation.en: The environmental impact alone from the companies you had me pick could be devastating.
translation.ja: あなたが選ばせた会社は 環境破壊を推し進めてる

translation.en: In fairness to us, the environment was pretty much toast before we came along.
translation.ja: 私たちの行動前から 環境は壊れてた

translation.en: And by the way, Maya, you did it, all of it,
translation.ja: それに あなた自身の行いよ

translation.en: because somewhere inside that cheap suit and ridiculous ponytail is me.
translation.ja: 安いスーツでダサい髪形でも 私は私なんだから

translation.en: I'm leaving.
Where you going?
You seeing someone?
No, you're not. You're too busy.
translation.ja: 違うわね　忙しすぎるもの

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Thing is, you always will be.
This company is all you will ever have.
translation.ja: あなたには会社しかない

translation.en: -[sighs] -It is your personal life.
It's your family.
But this is our legacy.
And if we had let the government take it from us,
translation.ja: 政府に会社を奪われれば…

translation.en: then everything we sacrificed,
all that loneliness,
all that loneliness,
would've been for nothing.
And I did it. I fixed that future where we had been forgotten.
translation.ja: 存在ごと忘れ去られる未来を 私が変えたのよ

translation.en: Then why are you back here now?
I'm back
because we can't control time travel if it never existed.
translation.ja: 存在しなければ 支配できないからよ

translation.en: And your buddy Adam Reed is about to betray you.
translation.ja: アダムに裏切られそうなの

translation.en: Adam? He's just a little kid.
Yeah, well, that little kid…
[laughs] …he grows up to be a very big pain in our ass.
translation.ja: 厄介(やっかい)な存在になるの

translation.en: [sighs] Trust me. You're gonna want this.
translation.ja: 飲まずにいられないわ

translation.en: What?
I know you think you know more than me because you're older.
translation.ja: 大人でも僕より分かってない

translation.en: Go away, Adam. [sighs]
And I know why you hate him so much.
translation.ja: なぜパパを恨むか分かる

translation.en: Really?
[laughs] Well, do tell. I'm on the edge of my seat here.
translation.ja: ぜひ聞かせてほしいね

translation.en: Holy shit. I wonder what it i-- Was it because he's narcissistic,
translation.ja: 自己中心的な父親だから？

translation.en: or, uh, never came home from work or cared more about his job than his son--
translation.ja: 息子より仕事を愛し 家に帰らず…

translation.en: It's because he died.
You hate him
because he died.
You made yourself hate him
because it was easier than missing him.
And I remember some stuff that you maybe don't wanna.
translation.ja: あんたが忘れたことも 覚えてる

translation.en: Oh yeah?
Like what?
He played catch with us almost every night.
translation.ja: パパは毎晩 キャッチボールをしてくれた

translation.en: Catch.
He'd get home from work,
be so tired, and I'd be in the yard throwing the ball against the pitch back.
translation.ja: 疲れてたのに 僕はリターンネットに 向かって投げてた

translation.en: -You remember the pitch back, right? -Oh, I… I remember the pitch back.
translation.ja: 僕はリターンネットに 向かって投げてた 相手しなくて済むよう パパが買ってくれたな

translation.en: Yeah, he bought it so he didn't have to play with me.
translation.ja: 相手しなくて済むよう パパが買ってくれたな

translation.en: Nope.
He bought it because they had one in the window of Altman's.
translation.ja: デパートの窓に 飾られてたからだ

translation.en: And every time we passed that store,
translation.ja: 通る度にパパにねだった

translation.en: I begged him to buy it for me, so that's what Dad did.
translation.ja: だから買ってくれたんだ

translation.en: He'd see me throwin' in the yard, and no matter how tired he was,
translation.ja: どんなに疲れてても 投げる僕を見れば―

translation.en: he'd always grab his mitt to come out for a catch.
translation.ja: ミットを持って 庭に来てくれた

translation.en: Things happened to you, to us.
translation.ja: 僕らは つらい経験をした

translation.en: And we suck at dealing with it.
translation.ja: それを受け入れるのが下手だ

translation.en: I'm starting to think it's something we do. I give Mom a hard time now, and…
translation.ja: それが原因だよ 僕はママを困らせてる

translation.en: I think…
I think it's easier to be angry than it is to be sad.
translation.ja: 悲しむより怒るほうが楽だ

translation.en: And I guess, when I get older,
translation.ja: 年を取って その違いが―

translation.en: I forget that there's a difference.
How'd you get to be so smart?
How'd you get to be so dumb?
Nice try, asshole.
[Ellie] Adam, make sure you feed Hawking before you leave for school, honey.
translation.ja: アダム ホーキングに 餌をあげてね

translation.en: -You're still here. -[Louis] Oh. And you're cooking. What are you making? Hi.
translation.ja: まだ いたの 何か作ってる？

translation.en: Uh, I know you like the Denver omelet.
That's not a Denver omelet. That is a cry for help.
translation.ja: それはオムレツじゃない 惨死体よ

translation.en: The eggs are burnt, and the bacon's still somehow totally raw.
translation.ja: 卵は焦げてベーコンは生だ

translation.en: Oh, you… Oh, no, no. No, no, no. Wha-- Do you wanna talk about why you're still here instead of being at work?
translation.ja: どうして まだ仕事に 行ってないの？

translation.en: I… I… Well, I just wanted to stay home with you today.
translation.ja: 今日は家族と過ごしたい

translation.en: You don't say. I like this guy.
translation.ja: ウソみたい　最高の夫ね

translation.en: This guy likes you.
What's going on with you, honey?
Does he seem, uh… does he seem sad to you?
No.
He's an odd duck, like his dad.
translation.ja: 父親に似て変人だから

translation.en: I happen to collect odd ducks.
I don't know if I should've built that game for him.
translation.ja: ゲームを 作るべきじゃなかった

translation.en: Shouldn't he be outside, playing with the rest of the kids?
translation.ja: ゲームを 作るべきじゃなかった 友達と遊ばないと 居場所ができない

translation.en: How is he gonna find his place in the world?
translation.ja: 友達と遊ばないと 居場所ができない

translation.en: "His place in the world"? He's a kid. We're his place in the world.
translation.ja: アダムは子供よ 親が居場所になればいい

translation.en: You're his place in the world.
[sighs] Okay, whatever is going on, listen, I can tell you the truth
translation.ja: 何かあったなら 本音で話すか―

translation.en: or something that's gonna make you feel better.
I'd rather cut to it and tell you the truth, if you're up for it.
I… I'd rather something that'll make me feel better. [laughs] Yeah, I know.
translation.ja: できれば優しく 慰めてほしいな

translation.en: Kidding. Sort of. Okay, tell me.
translation.ja: 冗談だ 言うべきことを言って

translation.en: When you are with us… [clicks tongue]
…you're with us 100%. It's amazing.
translation.ja: 家族を大切にしてくれてる

translation.en: And when you're not… [laughs] …it's like… pfft.
translation.ja: でも いない時は本当に…

translation.en: So is he a little lonely? Yeah, probably.
translation.ja: アダムは 寂しがってはいると思う

translation.en: But does that make you a shitty guy? No.
translation.ja: でも悪い父親じゃない

translation.en: I've gotta do better.
Hey, buddy, I have good news for you. He doesn't need perfect. He just needs you.
translation.ja: 完璧な父親は必要ない アダムにはあなたが必要なの

translation.en: Your cooking makes you a borderline serial killer, but the rest of you is pretty awesome.
translation.ja: 料理の腕は殺人級だけど それ以外は立派にやってる

translation.en: Ellie.
You know I love you.
Yeah, I know. I'm extremely lovable.
translation.ja: 知ってる　私は愛らしいもの

translation.en: Yeah.
I have to go to work. Okay, okay, okay.
translation.ja: 私は仕事に行かないと

translation.en: -And, hey, you got time. -[sighs]
translation.ja: 時間は たっぷりある

translation.en: "It's later than you think."
[young Adam] Really think we can?
Maybe, maybe not. We'll see.
translation.ja: さあな　やるしかない

translation.en: But we're gonna try anyway. Destroy time travel. How will we do that?
translation.ja: どうやって 時間旅行を消すの？

translation.en: This is the world's largest electromagnetic accelerator.
translation.ja: 世界最大の電磁加速器だ

translation.en: It's 2018, so EM technology isn't stable yet.
translation.ja: 2018年では 技術が安定してない

translation.en: So here's what we're gonna do. We're gonna blow this bitch up.
-Blow it up? -Yep.
How did I live this long? That's a terrible idea.
translation.ja: 大人のくせに最悪の案だ

translation.en: Yeah, well, when a bad idea is the only idea, it becomes a great idea.
translation.ja: 案が１つしかなければ 最悪でも最高の案だ

translation.en: Who said that?
You. Nine years from now, right before you get arrested.
translation.ja: ９年後 逮捕直前の お前の言葉だ

translation.en: -What? -Try to focus. We'll have to deal with security. You know this bag of toys you love?
translation.ja: 警備を突破するぞ このオモチャ袋を覚えてる？

translation.en: Yeah.
Being a geek is about to pay off.
-Reading me? -[young Adam] Roger that, Red Leader.
translation.ja: 聞こえる？ 了解 レッド･リーダー こちらバターカップ

translation.en: This is Butternut Sippy Cup. Ten-four, over.
translation.ja: 了解 レッド･リーダー こちらバターカップ

translation.en: Let's just talk like normal people, okay?
[young Adam] Copy that… Red Leader.
translation.ja: 了解した　レッド･リーダー

translation.en: Somethin's wrong.
There's nobody here.
Which means they're here. Sorian warned her younger self we were coming.
translation.ja: マヤは自身に警告したはず 無人のわけがない

translation.en: Are you sure?
Oh, pretty sure.
translation.ja: ああ 確実に本当だ

translation.en: -Don't move. On your knees. -I'm sorry. What?
We're taking you back to 2050, Reed.
I can't hear you through the helmet. It muffles a bit. It's hard to hear you.
translation.ja: ヘルメットのせいで よく聞こえない

translation.en: Don't get me wrong, your outfits are incredible though.
translation.ja: 誤解するな その装備はイカす

translation.en: They're intimidating but also scream, "Please don't hurt me."
translation.ja: ビビってるのが伝わる

translation.en: [soldier] On your knees. I won't tell you again.
translation.ja: 膝を突け　最終警告だ

translation.en: Well, you… you're right about that.
Adam, what are you doing? I'm about to get my ass kicked.
translation.ja: 何してる？ 俺は大ピンチだぞ

translation.en: Don't worry. He doesn't wanna fight.
They wanna fight. They really, really wanna fight.
Just look him in the eyes and smile.
Smile in a way that says, "I want this."
translation.ja: “ずっと待ってた”という 笑顔で

translation.en: "I've been waiting my whole life for this." Then hit him in the private bathing suit parts.
translation.ja: そしたら膝を突き モッコリした部分を打て

translation.en: -Adam! -Roger that.
Yeah!
Adam, you're on those cars, right?
translation.ja: アダム 車は任せた

translation.en: Roger that, middle-aged Adam.
Bye. Pfft.
Adam!
That was invigorating!
-Dad? -Dad?
-I'm sorry. Are you okay? -This close!
translation.ja: 平気か？ ギリギリな！

translation.en: -That was amazing. -This close!
-Where's little Adam? -He's fine!
translation.ja: 幼いほうは？ 無事だ

translation.en: -Hey, hey! -Hey? That's your mother's car.
translation.ja: おい ママの車だぞ

translation.en: The car?
What are you doin' here?
I went to the motel, and when I didn't find you there, I… I figured I'd find you here.
translation.ja: 宿にいないから ここだと思った

translation.en: It's not like you're keeping a low profile, obviously.
What the hell is this?
Tell you what? You come up with a plan, and we'll do it your way. Sound good?
translation.ja: あんたが計画を考えていい うれしいか？

translation.en: Oh God. Thank God. There's a plan.
translation.ja: よかった 計画もなしに 実行するバカじゃなくて

translation.en: I was beginning to think you were making this up as you went along.
translation.ja: 計画もなしに 実行するバカじゃなくて

translation.en: Adam, I'm goin' inside. Cover the perimeter.
translation.ja: アダム 中に入る 背後を見張れ

translation.en: -No one gets in behind me. -Sorry. That was harsh.
translation.ja: アダム 中に入る 背後を見張れ 言いすぎた

translation.en: Roger Dodger.
[Adam] Harsh? You shaved my ass with a Subaru.
translation.ja: まず車で突撃したのを謝れ

translation.en: I… I saved your ass with a Subaru, son.
translation.ja: 車で息子を救ったんだ

translation.en: What's Dad doing?
-Dad's being critical. Big surprise. -Okay, I--
translation.ja: 驚くことに批判してくる

translation.en: You're trying to break into a highly sensitive, secure facility with a sixth-grader. I am not being critical. I'm… I'm narrating.
translation.ja: 厳重警備の施設に12歳と 侵入しようとするからだ

translation.en: Will you just stop? Stop. Where the hell are you going?
translation.ja: 止まれ　何をする気だ？

translation.en: To destroy your accelerator, and I'm gonna enjoy it.
translation.ja: 加速器を壊す　楽しみだ

translation.en: Do you realize that you have broken every rule? You've blown past every conceivable ethical boundary like it wasn't there.
translation.ja: あらゆる倫理に 反してる自覚はあるのか？

translation.en: Yeah? Then why are you here, Dad?
translation.ja: そう思うなら なぜ来た？

translation.en: Because you can't do it without me.
translation.ja: 私がいないと できない

translation.en: Some people dream of the future.
translation.ja: 未来を夢みる人もいる

translation.en: Here at Sorian Technologies, we're building it.
translation.ja: ソリアン社では未来を作る

translation.en: [Louis] If you destroy the accelerator, Sorian will simply rebuild it.
translation.ja: 加速器を壊しても 作り直される

translation.en: -[Adam] So what will work? -[Louis] What you're after is ISPCA.
translation.ja: どうすれば？ ＩＳＰＣＡを狙え

translation.en: Infinitely Shifting Plasma Containing Algorithm,
translation.ja: 無限シフトプラズマ 含有アルゴリズムだ

translation.en: which I designed to stabilize the wormholes. That is the mathematical equation that will make time travel possible.
translation.ja: ワームホールを安定させ 時間旅行を可能にする数式だ

translation.en: How do you destroy math?
I've never written the algorithm down or demonstrated it to another human being, so it lives here in the old bean,
translation.ja: 他人に見せたことはない 私の頭の中にある

translation.en: and in the subbasement in a diamond-hard neuromorphic processor.
translation.ja: あと地下の硬い 脳模倣型処理機の中に

translation.en: Are you talking about your penis?
Can… can we be serious now?
Yes. No. Yes.
translation.ja: ああ いや うん

translation.en: -It's a hard drive, okay? -[chuckles]
-God, you're such a child. -Sorry.
There is a crystal hard drive running the algorithm in a closed loop.
translation.ja: アルゴリズムを走らせる ドライブが

translation.en: That is the nerve center of the accelerator.
translation.ja: 加速器の中枢に存在する

translation.en: So we go there, destroy the hard drive, prevent time travel from being invented.
translation.ja: ドライブを壊せば 時間旅行は消えるな

translation.en: Theoretically, time travel--
Oh my God! You're killing me with the theoretical.
translation.ja: 科学の話は やめろ

translation.en: -Yes, that should do it. -Good. Let's do that.
translation.ja: 可能だ なら やろう

translation.en: -Okay. Okay. -Okay. Okay.
-Okay. -[whirring]
-This is where you work. -Yes.
translation.ja: ここが職場か ああ

translation.en: Only took you 44 years to bring me here.
translation.ja: 訪ねるのに44年もかかった

translation.en: Fair.
I am so keeping this thing.
translation.ja: これ 返したくないな

translation.en: -[Adam] So this is it? -[Louis] This is it.
I gotta hand it to you, Dad. You were not messin' around.
translation.ja: 大したもんだ　称賛するよ

translation.en: This is where we house the hard drive.
translation.ja: ここにドライブがある

translation.en: -[Adam] What happens if you pull it out? -[Louis] One of two things.
The accelerator will continue to run on a dormant loop.
translation.ja: 休眠状態でのループに入るか

translation.en: But without the algorithm, no one will ever be able to program it again.
translation.ja: 再プログラムは 不可能になるが

translation.en: Or?
Or there's a cataclysmic meltdown
that will destroy all living things within 100 miles.
translation.ja: 160キロ圏内の 生物が死滅する

translation.en: Well, let's hope it's the first thing.
[computer] Neuromorphic hard drive panel accessed.
translation.ja: 脳模倣型ドライブにアクセス

translation.en: Screw it.
[Maya] Louis.
[Louis] Maya?
Long time no see.
Oh, this shit's about to get weird.
translation.ja: 変な感じになってきた

translation.en: Were you really gonna steal that from us? Destroy everything we've worked for?
translation.ja: 私たちの努力の集大成を 盗むつもり？

translation.en: [Louis] Our work was supposed to have moral ground rules.
translation.ja: 倫理的な研究だったはず

translation.en: -We were gonna change the world. -Change the world?
translation.ja: 世界を変える 変わったのは君だ 正気を失ったか？

translation.en: The only thing that's changed is you. Have you lost your mind?
translation.ja: 変わったのは君だ 正気を失ったか？

translation.en: All these years, I funded your work. I'm not the villain here. I spent millions--
translation.ja: 私は悪者じゃない ずっと研究に資金援助を…

translation.en: Hundreds of millions of my money, my wealth. -Mmm. -Just to fund your every indulgence.
translation.ja: 何億もの私の資金を あなたが楽しむために使った

translation.en: But this…
this is mine to do with as I please.
translation.ja: 私のしたいように するための物よ

translation.en: Now,
Adam,
give me… the drive.
No. Just… no.
I thought you were gonna say that.
Come here.
Gimme the gun.
Maya, Jesus Christ.
What are you doing? Are you crazy?
Oh, I think that's well established.
Adam, just listen to her.
It's okay. It's all right.
'Cause Adam's gonna give me the drive right now.
translation.ja: アダムはドライブを渡すもの

translation.en: Aren't you, Adam?
-Adam? -Adam?
[Sorian] Hey, beautiful idiot. If I shoot him, you die too.
translation.ja: この子を殺せば あなたも死ぬのよ

translation.en: [Louis] Adam?
I'm thinking it over.
-What? What do you mean you're thinking? -Yeah.
-It's a complicated issue. -What is there to think over?
translation.ja: 複雑な問題だから 何が複雑？

translation.en: -It's a big decision! -No, it's not!
-It's not. -I need to think it through!
I'm about to lose my shit here!
-Give her the drive! -Give her the drive, man!
-Give her the drive! -[Maya] Please!
[computer] Electromagnetic seal compromised.
[computer] Commencing emergency protocols.
[soldier] Come here.
-Dad! -Adam!
[grunts] Hey! Let me go!
[Louis] Adam, just hang on!
-[young Adam] Let me go! -Get me that drive! Now!
translation.ja: 放して ドライブを！

translation.en: [computer] Access denied.
[young Adam] Get off me! Dad!
This way!
♪ I don't want no more ♪
Yeah.
-Get the drive! -The drive!
translation.ja: ドライブを！ よこせ

translation.en: [whispers] Superhero landing.
Ever had your ass kicked by a 12-year-old nerd with an inhaler?
translation.ja: いじめられっ子に いじめられる覚悟は？

translation.en: -Suppertime, Spanky. -No.
-[yelps] -No!
Finish him!
-[Christos] Come on! -[choking]
-[Sorian] Christos! -No!
[computer] Core breached. Reactor stability compromised. Commence evacuation.
translation.ja: 炉心破損 リアクター不安定 排出開始

translation.en: Lockdown in two minutes.
Buddy, it's time to go. Come on.
I can't shut it down!
[Maya] Stop!
I want my drive.
You can't have it.
Shoot him now.
Get behind me, both of you.
Look, Dad, Dad, those guns shoot armor-piercing bullets. So even behind you, we're still Swiss cheese.
translation.ja: あれは徹甲弾だ 後ろに隠れても貫通する

translation.en: -Thanks for that information. -You're welcome.
translation.ja: 物知りだな どうも

translation.en: -Maybe spread out a little. -Maybe a good idea.
translation.ja: 広がれば？ そうだね

translation.en: [Louis] Maya, you're not a murderer. Not yet, anyway.
translation.ja: マヤ 今の君は殺人者じゃない

translation.en: [Sorian] Listen to me. Everything we've worked for,
translation.ja: 今までの全ての努力が―

translation.en: it goes away unless you pull this trigger.
translation.ja: 撃たないと無駄になる

translation.en: Okay, come on.
[computer] One minute 30 seconds until lockdown.
[Sorian] You can do it.
Do it!
Maya, you're better than this.
translation.ja: 君は そんな人じゃない

translation.en: Sorry, Louis, but you brought this on yourself.
translation.ja: 残念だけど自業自得よ

translation.en: Maybe so.
You think I'm playing?
Ask your son how I play.
I had to kill his wife twice to protect the integrity of my program.
translation.ja: 計画遂行のため 私は２度 彼の妻を殺した

translation.en: Now, don't think I won't put a bullet right through you.
translation.ja: 撃たないなんて 思わないことね

translation.en: Give it to me!
No.
[computer] One minute until lockdown.
You just never understood the bigger picture. [chuckles sadly]
translation.ja: 大局的な見地が 分からないのね

translation.en: And you never understood the science.
translation.ja: 科学が分からないんだな

translation.en: How did you know that would work?
